articles.title: Ali Emre Karagül
articles.contents:
AL.EM.KA.
          
          
          PSYCHOMETRICS
          ME
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Ali Emre Karagül
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            ABOUT ME
            I am a tech-savvy person with a data-driven mindset.
            Currently, I work on my PhD in Educational Assessment and
            Evaluation. My research interest is on Automated Essay
            Scoring, which has led me through machine learning and
            natural language processing.
            
            
            EDUCATION
            
            Gazi University
            Faculty of Education (2022-ongoing)
            Ph.D. student in the Department of Educational Assessment
            and Evaluation
            
            
            Ankara University
            Faculty of Educational Sciences (2016-2020)
            Master’s Degree in Assessment and Evaluation in
            Education
            
            
            Gazi University
            Faculty of Education (2008-2014)
            Bachelor’s degree in the Department of Foreign Language
            Education
            
            
            
            CONTACT ME
            Always feel free to contact me about any feedback,
            questions, or maybe just to say “hi”.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Ali Emre Karagül
